metadata.name: Sysinternals PsService Execution
metadata.comment: Detects usage of Sysinternals PsService which can be abused for service reconnaissance and tampering

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('psservice.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\psservice.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\psservice64.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of Sysinternals PsService which can be abused for service reconnaissance and tampering

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of PsService by an administrator Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/downloads/psservice
